thread.title: NAPW Inducts Lisa Roll, First Vice President - Investments of Wells Fargo Advisors, Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year Circle
thread.title_full: NAPW Inducts Lisa Roll, First Vice President - Investments of Wells Fargo Advisors, Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year Circle

author: Lisa Mancuso
title: NAPW Inducts Lisa Roll, First Vice President - Investments of Wells Fargo Advisors, Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year Circle
text:
The National Association of Professional Women (NAPW) honors Lisa Roll as a 2015-2016 inductee into the NAPW VIP Woman of the Year Circle. She is recognized with this prestigious distinction for leadership in business. With more than 700,000 members and over 200 operating Local Chapters, NAPW is the nation’s leading networking organization exclusively for professional women. “I’m pleased to welcome Lisa into this exceptional group of professional women,” said NAPW President Star Jones. “Her outstanding work and her continued pursuit of professional excellence illustrates her commitment to her chosen field.”
Self-motivated, results oriented and driven to succeed, Lisa Roll is a seasoned professional who has constantly set her career goals to keep pace with her highest aspirations for personal excellence. She has been working in the financial services industry for over 17 years. Starting her career as a bank teller at a small Savings & Loan, she eventually became a Sales Assistant at a brokerage firm. Within a few years, she passed her Series 7 and Series 65 exams and became a Licensed Assistant working for three Senior Advisors. In 2002, she was offered a partnership and entered the Financial Advisor Training Program at her firm.
“It’s important to meet the needs of each client specifically to be successful in this role as an advisor,” she said.
Ms. Roll recently enrolled in college to finish her degree. During her free time, she enjoys making pottery and plans on expanding her pottery business after her children go to college within a few years. She currently has an account on Etsy and donates all of her profits to CASA, an organization she volunteers for as an advocate for children in foster care.
“I hope to be able to donate more money over the years and it gives my hobby of making pottery a rewarding purpose,” Ms. Roll said.

Etsy
About NAPW
NAPW’s mission is to provide an exclusive, highly advanced networking forum to successful women executives, professionals and entrepreneurs where they can aspire, connect and achieve. Through innovative resources, unique tools and progressive benefits, professional women interact, exchange ideas, advance their knowledge and empower each other.
